file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
    version: 1.0.0
    title: OpenAPI /w JSON Schema Example
paths:
    /a:
        get:
            summary: foo
            responses:
                200:
                    description: 'OK'
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: './a.json'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /a: get: operation "": responses: 200: content: "application/json": schema: parse schema: resolve "./a.json": find schema: external base "./a.json" is not supported
